Master of Enchanting
%% Obtained from the mobs try to enchant the scroll Staff.%% The more enchanted, the more valuable the reward you get.%% %% Besides hunting monsters, you can buy enchants of the master.%% On one account are available 24 grinding for 6 hours 6000 Adena.%% Impatient can acquire more enchants, but for 77 777 Adena Adena.%% %% Once you've finished enchanting staff, take it to a master and get a reward.%%
